explicit

Class CTMDPSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.ModelExplicit
      • explicit.MDPExplicit
        • explicit.MDPSimple
          • explicit.CTMDPSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CTMDP, MDP, MDPGeneric<java.lang.Double>, Model, ModelSimple, NondetModel, NondetModelSimple

    public class CTMDPSimple
extends MDPSimple
implements CTMDP
    Simple explicit-state representation of a CTMDP.

      • CTMDPSimple

        public CTMDPSimple(CTMDPSimple ctmdp,
                   int[] permut)
        Construct a CTMDP from an existing one and a state index permutation, i.e. in which state index i becomes index permut[i]. Note: have to build new Distributions from scratch anyway to do this, so may as well provide this functionality as a constructor.
